Title: Staff Zuora System Engineer
RoleDescription:
At Lyft, our purpose is to serve and connect. We aim to achieve this by cultivating a work environment where all team members belong and have the opportunity to thrive.
Our core corporate functions are critical to our company's success. The health and sustainability of our applications, systems, tooling and processes are critical for daily operations and for our ability to grow. The Staff Zuora Systems Engineer possesses both business and technical acumen at an advanced level. This leadership role provides architectural guidance for our billing and revenue recognition systems, designing scalable solutions, leading complex implementations, developing integration strategies, and ensuring alignment with business objectives and regulatory requirements.
To effectively support our business stakeholders, candidates for this role must be proactive, detail oriented, highly technical, analytical, service focused and possess the ability to execute the following skills:
Responsibilities:

Techno-Functional professional with 7+ years of experience in Zuora Billing and Zuora Revenue implementations and a senior team member with full cycle implementations
A minimum of 7-10 years of experience implementing subscription billing solutions, particularly Zuora Billing, Zuora Revenue, and integrations with Salesforce and Oracle Fusion Cloud ERP
Demonstrated experience leading the architectural design for billing and revenue recognition systems, ensuring compliance with ASC 606 and GAAP standards
As a Billing Systems Architect, responsible for defining the systems strategy, capturing and analyzing business requirements, and translating them into Zuora solution architecture that aligns with organizational objectives
Expert knowledge in Billing models, Revenue Recognition principles, and ASC 606 compliance
Extensive experience with Zuora APIs and workflows, leveraging deep technical expertise to design, optimize, and troubleshoot billing and revenue management integrations
Skilled in orchestrating complex API-based solutions, ensuring seamless system interactions and efficient workflow automation
Lead fit-gap analysis, as-is and to-be business process designs, functional configuration, testing, and user training
Experience facilitating the integration of billing solutions to enhance revenue recognition processes
Should be able to design custom solutions using Zuora best practices for subscription management and revenue recognition
Should be able to lead design, development, and different testing activities across teams
Must have experience collaborating with business users on business process enhancements and strategic initiatives
Strong oral and written communication skills, including presentation skills to executive stakeholders
Advanced problem solving and troubleshooting skills with the ability to exercise mature judgment
Maintain and document current and new system requirements for complex implementations
Perform advanced system administration tasks, including security design and role-based access policies
Work with product, engineering and operational business stakeholders to understand and prioritize business systems needs
Design architectural solutions that enhance resilience and promote business continuity
Manage the deployment of new software, version upgrades, patch releases and major incidents
Lead development, Test, Release and Production environment strategies
Identify actionable, value-added optimization opportunities and contribute to the continuous improvement of our applications and processes
Uphold strict and consistent standards of process documentation and knowledge transfer
Manage stakeholder requirements and develop detailed implementation plans for enterprise-level initiatives
Carry out regular stakeholder meetings and effective communication sessions with all levels of the organization
Carry out technical system audits to ensure compliance with appropriate standards
Lead agile methodology practices in the development and configuration processes

Experience:

7+ years work experience with Zuora Billing and Zuora Revenue implementation and configuration
Deep understanding of subscription billing models, revenue recognition principles, and ASC 606 compliance
Extensive experience integrating Zuora with Salesforce and Oracle Fusion Cloud ERP
Advanced knowledge of Zuora APIs and workflows for designing complex system integrations
Strong understanding of the software development lifecycle and familiarity with development and support activities
Experience leading technical teams and mentoring junior staff
Experience of developing strategic plans and advanced project management techniques
Proven ability to translate complex business problems into scalable architectural solutions
Excellent communication skills with the ability to articulate technical concepts to business executives
Experience transforming data & automating processes using scripting languages
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field required; Master's preferred
Preferred Qualifications:

Zuora Billing Solutions Architect certification
Zuora Revenue Solutions Architect certification
Experience with ADW, Snowflake or other data warehouse technologies
Experience with CI/CD methodologies for financial systems
Prior experience at a SaaS company or subscription-based business



Benefits:

Great medical, dental, and vision insurance options with additional programs available when enrolled
Mental health benefits
Family building benefits
Child care and pet benefits
401(k) plan to help save for your future
In addition to 12 observed holidays, salaried team members have discretionary paid time off, hourly team members have 15 days paid time off
18 weeks of paid parental leave. Biological, adoptive, and foster parents are all eligible
Subsidized commuter benefits

Title: Senior Strategic Partnership Manager - Payment, Identity & Integrity
RoleDescription:
At Lyft, our purpose is to serve and connect. We aim to achieve this by cultivating a work environment where all team members belong and have the opportunity to thrive.
Since pioneering ridesharing in the United States, we've grown into a comprehensive transportation platform facilitating billions of rides across the US and Canada. We're committed to creating an open, inclusive, and diverse organization that empowers riders to connect with their communities and reach destinations with ease.
About the Team
The Payment, Identity and Integrity (PII) organization is the financial backbone of Lyft, powering essential e-commerce systems that serve our diverse customer ecosystem including riders, drivers, micromobility users, and B2B partners. We:

Manage billions of dollars in payment transactions across multiple countries
Combat identity theft and financial fraud to protect our users
Oversee 20+ strategic partnerships to optimize costs while driving growth
Build payment, identity and integrity products for our customers that directly drive ride volume

We're seeking an exceptional Senior Strategic Partnership Manager to craft and execute world-class, customer-centric payment strategies. The ideal candidate will combine technical expertise with creative problem-solving, strategic vision, and analytical precision. Success in this role requires outstanding collaboration skills, customer-focused thinking, and the ability to thrive in our dynamic, fast-paced environment.
Responsibilities

Identify emerging payment trends and innovations to incorporate into Lyft's roadmap
Develop and implement comprehensive payment strategies aligned with business objectives while enhancing customer experience
Provide metrics and reporting on payment product performance to executive leadership
Build and nurture strategic partner relationships, serving as the primary liaison between partners and Lyft's internal teams
Identify, evaluate, and negotiate with potential new partners to strengthen our payment ecosystem
Serve as a technical subject matter expert for payment processing, tax reporting, and regulatory compliance
Collaborate with engineering and data teams on API integrations and data processes with external vendors
Lead the development of technical documentation for partnership initiatives
Drive collaboration across product, engineering, finance, and tax teams to execute strategic payment initiatives
Lead and motivate cross-departmental teams to achieve organizational objectives

Experience:

Bachelor's degree in Finance, Business, or related field
8+ years of experience in partnerships, product management, or consulting within the payments industry
4+ years in management consulting, strategy operations, or program management within high-growth technology, fintech, payments, or ridesharing sectors
Demonstrated proficiency with SQL for data-driven performance measurement and analysis
Strong record of cross-functional leadership and stakeholder management
Deep understanding of payment processing systems, payment methods, routing, and industry regulations
Comprehensive knowledge of emerging payment trends and innovations
Ability to translate complex technical and financial concepts for diverse audiences
Outstanding communication and presentation skills with experience presenting to executive leadership
Exceptional organizational abilities with demonstrated success managing competing priorities
Strategic thinking with a customer-centric approach to problem-solving
Ability to thrive in fast-paced environments with changing priorities
Preferred:

MBA, CPA, or equivalent advanced certification
Experience with international payment systems and regulations
Knowledge of identity verification and fraud prevention technologies



Benefits:

Great medical, dental, and vision insurance options with additional programs available when enrolled
Mental health benefits
Family building benefits
Child care and pet benefits
401(k) plan to help save for your future
In addition to 12 observed holidays, salaried team members have discretionary paid time off, hourly team members have 15 days paid time off
18 weeks of paid parental leave. Biological, adoptive, and foster parents are all eligible
Subsidized commuter benefits
